attributes.title: DONT GET APP
attributes.review: I keep seeing and orange face? I was a bit confused what was going on but the app is slow takes a while to download. I am not a trump supporter because I dont have time, I have to walk my fish with that time.

attributes.title: Noooi
attributes.review: My great grandpa loved trump, he thought trump was our savor but while he was looking through the app and I went haywire. It no longer worked so he died of depression. Nobody liked him but still we spread his ashes somewhat memorable, this app is trash.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app is not well maintained because as soon as I downloaded it, it was going so slow and glitches so much. And then I got notification emails that my information was being hacked into!!!! Don’t download!!! I REPEAT, THIS IS NOT A DRILL! Blue2020

attributes.title: BLM/ Hispanic lives matter
attributes.review: This app is soo stupid I open it and it says it needs to update AGAIN after updating it. And it took forever , I’m very sad it doesn’t work 🥳. Would not recommend

attributes.title: AWFUL!!
attributes.review: ever since i downloaded the app , this horrible smell came to my room . then , my phone started glitching . my phone has been laggy ever since like i got a droid . this app not the move🙄 cheeto head

attributes.title: Deserves one star
attributes.review: This app is absolutely horrible. It glitches all the time and I swear it’s not my WiFi. Do not download because it can glitch out other apps on your device.

attributes.title: DISGUSTING
attributes.review: first thing when i open the app, trumps nudes. so inappropriate. the more i used the app my phone kept shutting off and i had to power it back on. i think it put a virus on my phone. do not recommend.

attributes.title: No💋
attributes.review: Getting rid off tik tok is the worst thing to do tik tok is a happy place for so many people and where do we go if we have no tik tok kids love it we can express our selfs and have fun there is no reason to get rid of it

attributes.title: Made my phone explode
attributes.review: My poor little phone couldn’t handle all of the crap thrown at it when I downloaded this app, and simply exploded, scarring me for life (it damaged my sense of hope for America with Trump as our president)

attributes.title: 🤡 trump
attributes.review: Trump is a bully and he is rude. He separates family and keeps kids and cages. He said Mexicans are rapist but sir he’s one himself. Donald trump said that staying home is how the corona virus increases but if you think that you are stupid. He does sins that disrespects God. Tik tok lives matter ✊✊🏻✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿. Gen Z rules 2020!!
